name: LineageOS
changelog:
• Android 15 QPR2.
  • Updated to May ASB.
  • New kernel based on LineageOS SM8150 common kernel.
  • Implemented UClamp and UFFD GC.
  • Implemented Lineage libperfmgr.
  • Replaced OMX with Codec2.
  • Updated audio hal to V7.
  • Updated thermal, vibrator and IR HALs.
  • Fixed microphone volume once and for all.
  • Fixed missing CNE app dependency.
notes:
• Firmware bundled.
  • Additional features no longer included.
  • This build is based on the new SM6125 common trees. This will be pretty close to the official release coming in the future.
  • Skyblueborb is also maintaining LineageOS 18.1
